id: Setup API to download conversation from intercom to CSV
text:
We use intercom for managing support chats. We'd like to be able to download all of our conversation history for further analysis in various tools and with AI but this is only possible via the Intercom API: https://developers.intercom.com/docs/references/rest-api/api.intercom.io/conversations/detachtagfromconversation

We would like to setup a simple tool where we can pull conversations for a given date range and export them all with all avaialble metadata into a CSV. We can host the tool on reddit or if a different suggestion of way to run discuss that too.

I can share our application key once accepted for access to the API

Acceptance Criteria
User can select a date range
User can download intercom conversations into well formatted CSV with given date range. CSV should include all available columns in the API to use for further analysis and full conversation details.

I need someone who could make me 2 3D models for a website that I'm making. Examples of those models are on this link: https://files.fm/u/ddaeshrfky
I only need that cone and that surface to look the same.
Acceptance Criteria
I will accept anyone who can deliver this as quick as possible.

id: App that convert your selfies to artworks. I have Flux Models ready.
text:
I have trained some styles in https://fal.ai/dashboard/apps , using flux lora.
I have 4 styles for female avatars, 4 styles for male avatars. I have also tested them with face loras to see how they work and I have notes on how to combine style scale with the face lora scale to get the best results.
Now I need someone to help me create an app where a person would upload his/her selfies and based on that generate artworks, using the art style models that I have worked on.

In steps I imagine the app like this:
1- Choose Male of Female.

2- Choose a style     A  B   C   D

3- Upload 20-30 selfies

4- ( the user just waits 15-20minutes )
we train the face and combine it with the style and prompt that we already have and generate 30 images.
To get the 30 avatars, I imagine it to be a different combination of style scale and avatar scale. ( for example 6 avatars : style scale 1.0 , face scale 1.2.    Another 6 avatars: style scale 1.0 , face scale 1.4 , and so on until we reach 30 images ).
...

id: Data Labeling of 550 F&B Package Images for Text Extraction
text: We are seeking a meticulous data labeler to accurately annotate 550 food and beverage (F&B) package images. The primary goal is to extract and categorize text information from these images to enhance our Document AI processor's accuracy and reliability.

Willing to increase bounty amount based on scope

Problem Description
Purpose
Build a tool that helps clients pull insights from customer reviews to use in digital ads. The tool should identify themes/trends in reviews and allow for detailed sorting and filtering, so users can pull out specific details (useful for ad copy).

Gaps
Needs a user-friendly UI, optimized for scale.
Should make it easy to add reviews from multiple sources.
Prototype works, but not production-ready.

Acceptance Criteria
Dashboard & Visualization: Fast, responsive sorting and filtering with a clean, dashboard-like interface.
User Experience: Dynamic filtering, summary views for quick insights, and detailed views for digging into individual reviews. We’ll use a reference site for design alignment.
Production-Ready Requirements: Desktop-only, includes error handling, automated testing, and polished design.

Technical Details
Tech Stack: Open to suggestions. Currently using PostgreSQL and GoogleSheets. Just need a...
